item.title: Formal Notice sent to Oklahoma Attorney General Gentner Drummond
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_1557_0800_gentner_drummond_ag_oklahoma_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 05, 2024, 15:57 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 05, 2024, 01:57 -0600 (Central Standard Time) To: Gentner Drummond (Attorney General of Oklahoma) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_1557_0800_gentner_drummond_ag_oklahoma_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Drummond, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
